grid_failure.title: Grid Breaking Point Analysis
grid_failure.question: At what EV adoption percentage does the US electrical grid fail?
insights: Grid becomes CRITICAL at None% EV adoption
Grid FAILS completely at N/A% adoption
That's N/A million EVs on the road
Without massive grid investment, 100% EV is impossible

supply_chain_cascade.title: Supply Chain Cascade Failure
supply_chain_cascade.question: Days until auto production stops if Taiwan is blockaded
insights: Taiwan blockade: Auto production STOPS in 65 days
China battery disruption: 30 days to crisis

climate_ev_paradox.title: Climate-EV Paradox
climate_ev_paradox.question: Does rising temperature make EVs less viable in hot regions?

paradox.finding: Cities that need EVs most (hot, polluted) are where EVs perform worst

insights: Hot cities see 8-15% efficiency loss from climate change
85 million Americans in heat-affected EV regions
EVs perform worst where they're needed most
Requires larger batteries = higher cost in hot regions

insurance_spiral.title: EV Insurance Death Spiral
insurance_spiral.question: When do EV repair costs make them uninsurable?
insights: Battery replacement > car value creates 'death spiral'
Cheap EVs hit this point faster (Bolt at year 6-7)
Used EV market faces structural problem

wealth_multiplier.title: EV+Solar+Home Wealth Multiplier
wealth_multiplier.question: 20-year wealth difference between sustainable vs traditional choices
insights: Home appreciation + solar savings compound dramatically

charging_deserts.title: Charging Infrastructure Gaps
charging_deserts.question: Which regions are excluded from EV adoption?
insights: Infrastructure gap: 5.6x between leaders and deserts
Rural America being left behind in energy transition

gpu_neural_network.title: GPU Deep Learning Predictions
insights: Battery cost is strongest predictor of adoption
